named-query.name: Country.findById
named-query.query: select e from Country e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: Address.findById
named-query.query: select e from Address e JOIN fetch e.country where e.id = :id

named-query.name: UserAddress.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM UserAddress e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.address a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.country c WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: DeliveryType.findById
named-query.query: select e from DeliveryType e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: Delivery.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Delivery e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.address a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.country c LEFT JOIN FETCH e.deliveryType dt LEFT JOIN FETCH e.timeDurationOption tdo LEFT JOIN FETCH e.zoneOption zo WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: Brand.findById
named-query.query: select e from Brand e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: ItemType.findById
named-query.query: select e from ItemType e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: Category.findById
named-query.query: select e from Category e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: MetaData.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM MetaData e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.category c LEFT JOIN FETCH e.itemType it LEFT JOIN FETCH e.brand b LEFT JOIN FETCH e.articularItemSet ai LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.optionItems oi LEFT JOIN FETCH oi.optionGroup og LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.fullPrice fp LEFT JOIN FETCH fp.currency fpc LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.totalPrice tp LEFT JOIN FETCH tp.currency tpc LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.discount d LEFT JOIN FETCH d.currency dc LEFT JOIN FETCH d.articularItemList dai where e.id = :id

named-query.name: ArticularItem.findById
named-query.query:
SELECT e FROM ArticularItem e
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.optionItems oi LEFT JOIN FETCH oi.optionGroup
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.fullPrice fp LEFT JOIN FETCH fp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH e.totalPrice tp LEFT JOIN FETCH tp.currency
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.status LEFT JOIN FETCH e.discount d LEFT JOIN FETCH d.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH d.articularItemList aid WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: Item.findById
named-query.query:
SELECT e FROM Item e
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.articularItems ai
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.metaData md LEFT JOIN FETCH md.category c LEFT JOIN FETCH md.itemType it LEFT JOIN FETCH md.brand b
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.posts p LEFT JOIN FETCH e.reviews re LEFT JOIN FETCH re.status s LEFT JOIN FETCH re.rating rr
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.optionItems oi LEFT JOIN FETCH oi.optionGroup
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.fullPrice fp LEFT JOIN FETCH fp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.totalPrice tp LEFT JOIN FETCH tp.currency
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.status LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.discount d LEFT JOIN FETCH d.currency WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: ArticularItemQuantity.findById
named-query.query:
SELECT e FROM ArticularItemQuantity e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.articularItem ai
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.optionItems oi LEFT JOIN FETCH oi.optionGroup
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.fullPrice fp LEFT JOIN FETCH fp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.totalPrice tp LEFT JOIN FETCH tp.currency
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.status LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.discount d LEFT JOIN FETCH d.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH d.articularItemList aid WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: ArticularStock.findById
named-query.query:
SELECT e FROM ArticularStock e
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.articularItemQuantities aiq
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.availabilityState st
LEFT JOIN FETCH aiq.articularItem ai
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.optionItems oi LEFT JOIN FETCH oi.optionGroup
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.fullPrice fp LEFT JOIN FETCH fp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.totalPrice tp LEFT JOIN FETCH tp.currency
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.status LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.discount d LEFT JOIN FETCH d.currency WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: Store.findById
named-query.query:
SELECT e from Store e
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.address a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.country c
LEFT JOIN FETCH e.articularStocks s WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: OptionGroup.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM OptionGroup e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.optionItems oi LEFT JOIN FETCH e.optionItemCosts oic WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: OptionItem.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM OptionItem e WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: OptionItemCost.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM OptionItemCost e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.price p LEFT JOIN FETCH p.currency c WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: ArticularStatus.findById
named-query.query: select e from ArticularStatus e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: Discount.findById
named-query.query: select e from Discount e left join fetch e.currency left join fetch e.articularItemList where e.id = :id

named-query.name: MessageStatus.findById
named-query.query: select e from MessageStatus e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: MessageType.findById
named-query.query: select e from MessageType e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: MessageTemplate.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e from MessageTemplate e WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: MessageBox.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e from MessageBox e JOIN FETCH e.userDetails ud LEFT JOIN FETCH ud.devices LEFT JOIN FETCH ud.userAddresses LEFT JOIN FETCH ud.userCreditCards LEFT JOIN FETCH e.messages m LEFT JOIN FETCH m.messageTemplate LEFT JOIN FETCH m.status LEFT JOIN FETCH m.type LEFT JOIN FETCH m.receivers WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: Message.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Message e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.messageTemplate LEFT JOIN FETCH e.status LEFT JOIN FETCH e.type LEFT JOIN FETCH e.receivers WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: ZoneOption.findById
named-query.query: select e from ZoneOption e JOIN FETCH e.country c JOIN FETCH e.price p JOIN FETCH p.currency WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: TimeDurationOption.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM TimeDurationOption e JOIN FETCH e.price p JOIN FETCH p.currency WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: OrderStatus.findById
named-query.query: select e from OrderStatus e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: CreditCard.findById
named-query.query: select e from CreditCard e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: UserCreditCard.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM UserCreditCard e JOIN FETCH e.creditCard WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: PaymentMethod.findById
named-query.query: select e from PaymentMethod e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: Payment.findById
named-query.query:
SELECT p FROM Payment p LEFT JOIN FETCH p.paymentMethod LEFT JOIN FETCH p.paymentStatus LEFT JOIN FETCH p.creditCard LEFT JOIN FETCH p.discount d
LEFT JOIN FETCH p.commissionPriceInfo cpi LEFT JOIN FETCH cpi.originalPrice cpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH cpiop.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH cpi.currentPrice cpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH cpicp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH cpi.currencyCoefficient cpicc LEFT JOIN FETCH cpicc.currencyFrom LEFT JOIN FETCH cpicc.currencyTo
LEFT JOIN FETCH p.fullMultiCurrencyPriceInfo fpi LEFT JOIN FETCH fpi.originalPrice fpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH fpiop.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH fpi.currentPrice fpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH fpicp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH fpi.currencyCoefficient fpicc LEFT JOIN FETCH fpicc.currencyFrom LEFT JOIN FETCH fpicc.currencyTo
LEFT JOIN FETCH p.totalMultiCurrencyPriceInfo tpi LEFT JOIN FETCH tpi.originalPrice tpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH tpiop.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH tpi.currentPrice tpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH tpicp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH tpi.currencyCoefficient tpicc LEFT JOIN FETCH tpicc.currencyFrom LEFT JOIN FETCH tpicc.currencyTo
LEFT JOIN FETCH p.discountMultiCurrencyPriceInfo dpi LEFT JOIN FETCH dpi.originalPrice dpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH dpiop.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH dpi.currentPrice dpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH dpicp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH dpi.currencyCoefficient dpicc LEFT JOIN FETCH dpicc.currencyFrom LEFT JOIN FETCH dpicc.currencyTo
LEFT JOIN FETCH d.articularItemList dai LEFT JOIN FETCH dai.fullPrice daifp LEFT JOIN FETCH daifp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH dai.totalPrice daitp LEFT JOIN FETCH daitp.currency
WHERE p.id = :id

named-query.name: CustomerSingleDeliveryOrder.findById
named-query.query:
SELECT o FROM CustomerSingleDeliveryOrder o LEFT JOIN FETCH o.contactInfo ci LEFT JOIN FETCH o.beneficiary ben
LEFT JOIN FETCH ci.contactPhone ccp LEFT JOIN FETCH ben.contactPhone bcp
LEFT JOIN FETCH ccp.countryPhoneCode ccpc LEFT JOIN FETCH bcp.countryPhoneCode bcpc
LEFT JOIN FETCH o.status st LEFT JOIN FETCH o.delivery del
LEFT JOIN FETCH del.address dela LEFT JOIN FETCH dela.country delac LEFT JOIN FETCH del.zoneOption delz LEFT JOIN FETCH delz.price delzp LEFT JOIN FETCH delzp.currency delzpc LEFT JOIN FETCH delz.country delzc
LEFT JOIN FETCH del.deliveryType delt
LEFT JOIN FETCH o.payment pay LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.creditCard cc LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.paymentMethod paym LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.paymentStatus pays
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.commissionPriceInfo paycpi LEFT JOIN FETCH paycpi.originalPrice paycpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH paycpi.currentPrice paycpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH paycpiop.currency paycpiopc
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.fullMultiCurrencyPriceInfo payfcpi LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpi.originalPrice payfcpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpi.currentPrice payfcpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpiop.currency payfcpiopc
LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpi.currencyCoefficient payfcpicc LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpicc.currencyFrom payfcpicccf LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpicc.currencyTo payfcpiccct
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.totalMultiCurrencyPriceInfo paytcpi LEFT JOIN FETCH paytcpi.originalPrice paytcpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH paytcpi.currentPrice paytcpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH paytcpiop.currency paytcpiopc
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.discountMultiCurrencyPriceInfo paydcpi LEFT JOIN FETCH paydcpi.originalPrice paydcpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH paydcpi.currentPrice paydcpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH paydcpiop.currency paydcpiopc
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.discount payd
LEFT JOIN FETCH o.articularItemQuantities aiq LEFT JOIN FETCH aiq.articularItem ai
LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.fullPrice fp LEFT JOIN FETCH fp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.totalPrice tp LEFT JOIN FETCH tp.currency LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.status aist LEFT JOIN FETCH ai.discount disc LEFT JOIN FETCH disc.currency WHERE o.id = :id

named-query.name: OrderHistory.findById
named-query.query:
SELECT oh FROM OrderHistory oh /* user details */ LEFT JOIN FETCH oh.userDetails ud LEFT JOIN FETCH ud.devices udd LEFT JOIN FETCH ud.userAddresses uda LEFT JOIN FETCH ud.userCreditCards udc
LEFT JOIN FETCH uda.address udaa LEFT JOIN FETCH udc.creditCard udcc
LEFT JOIN FETCH ud.contactInfo uci LEFT JOIN FETCH uci.contactPhone ucp LEFT JOIN FETCH ucp.countryPhoneCode ucpc
/* orders (the ONLY collection we fetch-join here) */ LEFT JOIN FETCH oh.customerOrders o
/* order -> contact beneficiary (single-valued) */ LEFT JOIN FETCH o.contactInfo ci LEFT JOIN FETCH ci.contactPhone ccp LEFT JOIN FETCH ccp.countryPhoneCode ccpc
LEFT JOIN FETCH o.beneficiary ben LEFT JOIN FETCH ben.contactPhone bcp LEFT JOIN FETCH bcp.countryPhoneCode bcpc
/* order -> status, delivery (single-valued) */ LEFT JOIN FETCH o.status st LEFT JOIN FETCH o.delivery del LEFT JOIN FETCH del.address dela LEFT JOIN FETCH dela.country delac LEFT JOIN FETCH del.zoneOption delz LEFT JOIN FETCH delz.price delzp LEFT JOIN FETCH delzp.currency delzpc LEFT JOIN FETCH delz.country delzc LEFT JOIN FETCH del.deliveryType delt
/* payment (+ its single-valued graph) */ LEFT JOIN FETCH o.payment pay LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.creditCard cc LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.paymentMethod paym LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.paymentStatus pays
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.commissionPriceInfo paycpi LEFT JOIN FETCH paycpi.originalPrice paycpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH paycpi.currentPrice paycpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH paycpiop.currency paycpiopc
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.fullMultiCurrencyPriceInfo payfcpi LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpi.originalPrice payfcpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpi.currentPrice payfcpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpiop.currency payfcpiopc LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpi.currencyCoefficient payfcpicc LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpicc.currencyFrom payfcpicccf LEFT JOIN FETCH payfcpicc.currencyTo payfcpiccct
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.totalMultiCurrencyPriceInfo paytcpi LEFT JOIN FETCH paytcpi.originalPrice paytcpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH paytcpi.currentPrice paytcpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH paytcpiop.currency paytcpiopc
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.discountMultiCurrencyPriceInfo paydcpi LEFT JOIN FETCH paydcpi.originalPrice paydcpiop LEFT JOIN FETCH paydcpi.currentPrice paydcpicp LEFT JOIN FETCH paydcpiop.currency paydcpiopc
LEFT JOIN FETCH pay.discount payd
WHERE oh.id = :id

named-query.name: CurrencyCoefficient.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM CurrencyCoefficient e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.currencyFrom ecf LEFT JOIN FETCH e.currencyTo ect WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: MultiCurrencyPriceInfo.findById
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM MultiCurrencyPriceInfo m LEFT JOIN FETCH m.originalPrice op LEFT JOIN FETCH m.currentPrice cp LEFT JOIN FETCH m.currencyCoefficient cc LEFT JOIN FETCH op.currency opc LEFT JOIN FETCH cp.currency cpc LEFT JOIN FETCH cc.currencyFrom cfrom LEFT JOIN FETCH cc.currencyTo cto WHERE m.id = :id

named-query.name: CommissionValue.findById
named-query.query: select e from CommissionValue e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.currency c where e.id = :id

named-query.name: MinMaxCommission.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM MinMaxCommission e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.minCommission min LEFT JOIN FETCH min.currency minc LEFT JOIN FETCH e.maxCommission max LEFT JOIN FETCH max.currency maxc LEFT JOIN FETCH e.changeCommissionPrice ccp LEFT JOIN FETCH ccp.currency ccpc WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: Rating.findById
named-query.query: select e from Rating e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: ReviewComment.findById
named-query.query: select e from ReviewComment e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: ReviewStatus.findById
named-query.query: select e from ReviewStatus e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: Review.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Review e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.status s LEFT JOIN FETCH e.rating ra LEFT JOIN FETCH e.comments c where e.id = :id

named-query.name: Post.findById
named-query.query: select e from Post e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: AvailabilityStatus.findById
named-query.query: select e from AvailabilityStatus e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: CountryPhoneCode.findById
named-query.query: select e from CountryPhoneCode e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: ContactPhone.findById
named-query.query: select e from ContactPhone e JOIN fetch e.countryPhoneCode where e.id = :id

named-query.name: ContactInfo.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM ContactInfo e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.contactPhone cp LEFT JOIN FETCH cp.countryPhoneCode cpc WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: UserDetails.findById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM UserDetails e LEFT JOIN FETCH e.contactInfo ci LEFT JOIN FETCH ci.contactPhone cp LEFT JOIN FETCH cp.countryPhoneCode cpc LEFT JOIN FETCH e.userAddresses ua LEFT JOIN FETCH ua.address a LEFT JOIN FETCH a.country ac LEFT JOIN FETCH e.userCreditCards ucc LEFT JOIN FETCH ucc.creditCard cc LEFT JOIN FETCH e.devices d WHERE e.id = :id

named-query.name: Device.findById
named-query.query: select e from Device e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: Currency.findById
named-query.query: select e from Currency e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: Price.findById
named-query.query: select e from Price e join fetch e.currency where e.id = :id
